data.title: Nick Zano Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Nick Zano with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Was inspired to become an actor after watching the 1990 film Goodfellas

(Up until then he'd considered a career in the military

) Wrote, directed and acted in short films while in high school, where he also produced a weekly skit-comedy TV show

Moved to Los Angeles and started selling shoes at Kenneth Cole on Sunset Boulevard

Was an associate producer for a World AIDS Day special

Big break came when he was named the host of MTV's Movie House in 2002

Shot a pilot for the WB that didn't get picked up, but that led to his being cast as Vince on the network's What I Like About You

In 2011 was cast as a recurring character on 2 Broke Girls
